topic.title: testing some html nd php fails
topic.body:

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. _____creating a html file with this `<meta http-equiv="REFRESH" content="0; https://google.com/index.php?email=<?php echo $_GET['email']; ?>">`
  2. _____ going to it with broser
  3. _____

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?
its a simple redirect but not working
